replies.text: Welcome! I am the Email Skill. I can help you manage your Office 365 email, show your unread email, reply or forward email for you.
replies.speak: Welcome! I am the Email Skill. I can help you manage your Office 365 email, show your unread email, reply or forward email for you.

replies.text: I can provide you an overview of your latest emails, read out important emails to you, or create and forward a new email for you.
replies.speak: I can provide you an overview of your latest emails, read out important emails to you, or create and forward a new email for you.

suggestedActions: Forward the second email to somebody

replies.text: This feature is not yet available in the Email Skill. Please try asking something else.
replies.speak: This feature is not yet available in the Email Skill. Please try asking something else.
